name: yuxin-yolov5-train-baseline-m-mixup
Command: cd ~/code/yolov5/;~/miniconda3/envs/yolov5/bin/python -m torch.distributed.run --nproc_per_node 4 train.py --batch 64 --img 1280 --epochs 300 --data data/qianhai.yaml --weights weights/yolov5m.pt --hyp data/hyps/hyp.qianhai-low-mixup.yaml --cfg models/qianhai_yolov5m.yaml --sync-bn --device 0,1,2,3
